item.title: Uncertainty
item.dc:creator: Jeff Clark, MD
item.description: You cannot remove uncertainty from your life.  You can plan around it, mitigate against some of its biggest risks, and at times even enjoy it. But you can never escape it. Embrace uncertainty as a surprisingly stable foundation. If you don’t expect some change, you’ll build a life that will crumble when you try to […]
item.content:encoded:
You cannot remove uncertainty from your life. 

You can plan around it, mitigate against some of its biggest risks, and at times even enjoy it. But you can never escape it.  

Embrace uncertainty as a surprisingly stable foundation. If you don’t expect some change, you’ll build a life that will crumble when you try to reach your goals.
